attributes.action: Outlaw the use of Illegally Typefaced Vehicle Registration Plates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see that vehicles owners who have decided to use illegal typeface characters on their vehicles invalidate their insurance, as the vehicle is then considered unroadworthy.  This would stop the proliferation of these numbers plates that are now being seen on a regular basis.
